item.title: 苹果智能眼镜玩法曝光：既能连 Mac，又能连 iPhone
item.guid: 苹果智能眼镜玩法曝光：既能连-Mac，又能连-iPhone
item.description:
According to the latest report from Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Apple has suspended the development of a lightweight version of VisionPro (VisionAir) and is fully shifting its R&D focus to smart glasses. 据彭博记者 Mark Gurman 最新报道，苹果已暂停开发轻量版 VisionPro（VisionAir），将研发重心全面转向智能眼镜。

Gurman stated that this will be a key shift for Apple in its next-generation computing platform. Due to the lukewarm reception of VisionPro, Apple believes that closed headsets are difficult to become mainstream devices. Gurman 表示，这将是苹果在下一代计算平台上的关键转向。由于 visionPro 遇冷，苹果认为封闭式头显难以成为大众化设备。

Although VisionPro boasts leading technology, its high price of $3499, heavy weight, and sparse application ecosystem make it difficult to achieve iPhone-level market scale. In contrast, lightweight, everyday wearable smart glasses align more with Apple's "mainstream product" philosophy. Here is the information we currently have: 尽管 VisionPro 技术领先，但售价高达 3499 美元、重量偏重、应用生态稀薄，使其难以形成 iPhone 级的市场规模。相比之下，轻量、日常可佩戴的智能眼镜更符合苹果「主流化产品」哲学，这是目前我们已掌握的信息：

    Smart glasses are expected to run a lightweight version of visionOS and can work in conjunction with an iPhone or Mac.

    When the glasses are connected to an iPhone, they will run a lightweight version of the system, while when connected to a Mac, they can run the full version of visionOS.

    Based on current information, it is speculated that Apple is still advancing a multi-tiered Vision product line internally: low-end for screenless smart glasses, mid-range glasses equipped with displays, and high-end continuing to retain VisionPro.

    In fact, Apple has already reserved many technology patents for smart glasses, including patents for technology that links content between glasses and iPhones.

Gurman also mentioned Apple's smart wearable product line in the article. Gurman 还在文中提到了苹果的智能穿戴产品线。

He pointed out that although Apple has slowed down the upgrade pace of the Apple Watch in recent years, it has achieved a double harvest of "profit" and "technological accumulation" on this product line. 其指出，苹果近年来虽然放缓了 Apple Watch 的升级步伐，但是其已经在该产品线上「利润」「技术积累」双丰收。

It's worth noting that Gurman predicts that although the camera-equipped Apple Watch plan has been postponed, Apple will transform the Apple Watch into a more powerful AI device in the future. 值得一提的是，Gurman 预测，尽管带摄像头版 Apple Watch 计划推迟， 但苹果会在未来把 Apple Watch 打造成一个更加强大的 AI 设备。

As for AirPods, Gurman stated that Apple is already working on a new version of its next-generation in-ear headphones (speculated to be new AirPods Pro). He revealed that Apple's chip team is developing the H3 chip, aiming to reduce latency and improve sound quality; meanwhile, AirPods 5 is also in development. 而 AirPods 方面， Gurman 表示苹果已经在着手研发下一代入耳式耳机的新版本（推测为新 AirPods Pro）。 其透露，苹果的芯片团队正在开发 H3 芯片，旨在降低延迟和提升音质；同时，AirPods 5 也已经在研发的路上。

Gurman said that Apple might not bring the heart rate sensor to AirPods 5, but will add more health features to AirPods, such as temperature detection, for a period of time. Additionally, in the future, AirPods, like the Apple Watch, are being considered by Apple to have cameras and transform into AI devices. Gurman 称，苹果可能不会将心率传感器下放给 AirPods 5，但会在一段时间内，为 AirPods 新增更多健康功能，如温度检测等。 另外，未来 AirPods 将与 Apple Watch 一样，苹果也在考虑让其拥有摄像头且转变为 AI 设备。

item.title: 疑似小米第三款车型曝光，尺寸亮眼
item.guid: 疑似小米第三款车型曝光，尺寸亮眼
item.description:
According to a recent report by Che Dong Xi, videos of what is suspected to be Xiaomi's third model (temporarily named Xiaomi YU9) being tested in Xinjiang have recently surfaced online. On the 8th of this month, some netizens also encountered related models being tested on the road in Xinjiang. 据车东西日前报道，近期有疑似小米第三款车型（暂称为小米 YU9）在新疆测试的视频在网上曝光。而在本月 8 日时，也曾有网友在新疆遇到相关车型在路上测试。

From the exposed content, the Xiaomi YU9 mentioned above was covered in thick camouflage, but the '041' number could be seen on the parking space of one of the vehicles; additionally, the rearview mirror design of the vehicle is quite similar to that of the Xiaomi SU7 and YU7 models. 从曝光的内容来看，上述内容中的小米 YU9 贴着较厚的伪装，但从其中一辆可以看到车位的「041」编号；另外，车辆的后视镜造型与小米 SU7、YU7 车型的较为相似。

On October 11, Xiaomi founder Lei Jun posted that Xiaomi Auto would undergo high-altitude testing in Taxian County, Xinjiang, and he had personally arrived in Xinjiang. According to Lei Jun, more than 20 engineers participated in this high-altitude test, and there was a lot of test content, but he stated that some of it was to test the Xiaomi YU7's high-altitude range, charging, and sun protection (high-altitude UV rays are very strong). 而在 10 月 11 日，小米创办人雷军发文表示，小米汽车将在新疆塔县高原进行测试，并且其也已亲自抵达新疆。据雷军透露，本次高原测试，小米汽车有 20 多位工程师参与，并且测试内容较多，但其表示部分内容为测试小米 YU7 高原续航、充电、防晒（高原紫外线很强）等 。

According to media analysis, the photo released by Lei Jun shows it was taken at the foot of the Kunlun Mountains. Interestingly, there were previous online rumors suggesting that the internal codename for Xiaomi YU9 might be 'Kunlun,' but Lei Jun has not yet revealed any related information on social media. 而据媒体分析，从雷军放出的合照中可以看到这张照片拍摄于昆仑山脚下，有意思的是，之前就有网传信息显示，小米 YU9 的内部代号可能就是「昆仑」，不过雷军暂时没有在社交媒体上透露有关信息。

It is reported that Xiaomi's third model was exposed in November 2024. According to various leaked information, the new car will adopt an extended-range hybrid system, and its body length will exceed 5.2m, with a body height possibly reaching 1.8m. Recent content shows that the exposed spy car is large in size, consistent with previous information. 据悉，小米第三款车型在 2024 年 11 月遭到曝光，从各方爆料信息显示，新车将采用增程式混动， 并且车身长度超过 5.2m，车身高度或达到 1.8m。 而近期的内容显示，曝光的谍照车尺寸较大，也贴近此前的内容。

It is worth noting that Deutsche Bank previously published a research report on Xiaomi Auto, which mentioned that Xiaomi Auto plans to launch a large D-segment hybrid SUV in 2026. The standard body length for D-segment cars usually exceeds 5 meters, with the mainstream range between 5.1 meters and 5.4 meters. This corresponds to the spy photos showing the Xiaomi YU9's length possibly exceeding 5.2 meters, suggesting that the Xiaomi YU9 might be released in 2026. 值得一提的是，此前德意志银行曾发布过一份小米汽车研报，其中提到小米汽车 2026 年计划推出一款大型 D 级混动 SUV，而 D 级车身长度标准通常超过 5 米，主流范围在 5.1 米至 5.4 米之间，与谍照中小米 YU9 的车长可能在 5 米 2 以上对应，由此可见小米 YU9 或在 2026 年发布。

item.title: 商务部公告附件首次改为 wps 格式
item.guid: 商务部公告附件首次改为-wps-格式
item.description:
Yesterday, the topic 'Ministry of Commerce announcement attachment changed to WPS format for the first time' trended on hot searches. 昨日，「商务部公告附件首次改为 wps 格式」相关话题冲上热搜。

It is reported that on October 9, the Ministry of Commerce issued Announcement No. 61 of 2025, implementing export controls on certain overseas rare earth-related items containing Chinese components. The new regulations clarify that exports for military purposes will generally not be licensed, and applications related to advanced semiconductors and potential military AI uses will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis. Some provisions will be implemented from December 1, and items originating from China will be subject to these regulations immediately. 据悉，商务部于 10 月 9 日发布 2025 年第 61 号公告，对含有中国成分的部分境外稀土相关物项实施出口管制。 新规明确，军事用途出口原则上不予许可，先进半导体、潜在军事用途 AI 相关申请需逐案审批，其中部分条款自 12 月 1 日起实施，原产于中国的物项即日起执行。

In addition to the control rules, the attachment adopted the WPS format. According to multiple reports, the two latest announcements before October 9 were in Word or PDF format. At the same time, the requirement that application documents must be submitted in Chinese sparked widespread discussion. 而除管制规则外，附件采用 WPS 格式。据多方报道，10 月 9 日之前最新的两个公告，文件都是 word 或 pdf 格式。同时申请文件须以中文提交两大细节引发热议。

Netizens believe that **the WPS format highlights the application of domestic software and rule-making dominance, and the Chinese application requirement further demonstrates the intensity of control in detail.** 网友认为，**WPS 格式凸显国产软件应用与规则主导权，中文申请要求更在细节处彰显管控力度。 **

item.title: OpenAI 前 CTO 新公司被 Meta 挖角，联合创始人跳槽
item.guid: OpenAI-前-CTO-新公司被-Meta-挖角，联合创始人跳槽
item.description:
According to a recent report by The Wall Street Journal, there have been personnel changes at Thinking Machines Lab (TML), an AI startup founded by former OpenAI CTO Mira Murati — co-founder Andrew Tulloch has left and joined Mark Zuckerberg's Meta. 据《华尔街日报》日前报道，前 OpenAI CTO（首席技术官）Mira Murati 创立的 AI 初创 Thinking Machines Lab（TML）发生人员变动 —— 联合创始人 Andrew Tulloch 已离职，并加入扎克伯格的 Meta。

According to a TML spokesperson, Andrew decided to pursue a different path for personal reasons. TML also stated, 'We are very grateful for everything Andrew built at the company.' 据 TML 的发言人透露，Andrew 因个人原因决定选择走一条不同的路。同时 TML 也表示「很感谢 Andrew 在公司所建立的一切。」

It is reported that Andrew Tulloch is a leading researcher in the field of AI, who previously worked at Meta for 11 years, left in 2023, and joined OpenAI. This year, Andrew co-founded TML with Mira Murati. 据悉，Andrew Tulloch 为 AI 领域的领先研究人员，此前曾在 Meta 工作长达 11 年，于 2023 年离职并加入 OpenAI。今年，Andrew 与 Mira Murati 共同创立了 TML。

In August this year, Andrew was reportedly said to have rejected Meta's 'poaching attempt,' and it was reported that Meta offered him a high salary of $1.5 billion. However, a Meta spokesperson later denied the salary, stating it was 'inaccurate and absurd.' 今年 8 月， Andrew 曾被报道拒绝了 Meta 的「挖墙角」 ，并据报道，Meta 对其开出了 15 亿美元的高额薪资。 而 Meta 发言人则曾否认了该薪资，并表示「不准确且荒谬」。

Currently, TML has published two research papers: 'Defeating Nondeterminism in LLM Inference' and 'Modular Manifolds,' which focuses on making large model training processes stable and efficient from the ground up. 目前，TML 已发布两篇研究结果论文，分别为《Defeating Nondeterminism in LLM Inference》（克服 LLM 推理中的不确定性）和专注于从根源上让大模型训练过程变得稳定、高效的《Modular Manifolds》。

It's worth noting that TML was founded by several former OpenAI executives. Previously, TML's valuation soared to $12 billion (equivalent to 85.6 billion RMB) despite having '0 products and 0 users.' 值得一提的是，TML 由多位 OpenAI 前高管创立。此前 TML 在「0 产品 0 用户」的情况下，估值曾狂飙至 120 亿美元（折合人民币 856 亿元）。

item.title: vivo 起诉某 MCN 机构恶意诋毁
item.description:
Yesterday afternoon, vivo's legal department officially posted on Weibo, stating that multiple accounts under a certain MCN agency have long been fabricating and spreading false information, maliciously slandering its products and commercial reputation. 昨日下午，vivo 法务部官方微博发文称，某 MCN 机构旗下多个账号长期通过编造、散布不实信息，恶意诋毁其产品及商业信誉。

Regarding this situation, vivo stated that it has collected and secured evidence, filed a lawsuit according to law, and revealed that the case has been officially accepted. 对于该情况，vivo 方面表示已收集、固定证据，依法提起诉讼，并透露目前该案件已正式立案。

vivo stated that it respects and accepts suggestions and supervision from all sectors of society, but cyberspace is not beyond the reach of the law. Against any illegal acts such as fabricating and spreading false information or malicious defamation, it will take all necessary legal means to pursue the legal responsibilities of relevant parties and effectively safeguard its legitimate rights and interests. vivo 表示，其尊重并接受社会各界的建议和监督，但网络空间并非法外之地。针对任何编造散布虚假信息、恶意诋毁等违法行为，其将采取一切必要的法律手段，依法追究相关主体的法律责任，切实维护自身合法权益。

item.title: Qwen、豆包内测记忆功能，全面对标 ChatGPT
item.guid: Qwen、豆包内测记忆功能，全面对标-ChatGPT
item.description:
01Founder learned that two domestic tech giants—Alibaba and ByteDance—have simultaneously begun internal testing of a "memory function" for their AI assistants, Tongyi Qianwen (Qwen) and Doubao. 据 01Founder 获悉，国内两家科技巨头——阿里巴巴和字节跳动——旗下的 AI 助手通义千问（Qwen）和豆包（Doubao），同时开始内测「记忆功能」。

This move is widely seen as benchmarking against industry leader OpenAI's ChatGPT, marking the accelerated evolution of domestic AI assistants from "instant Q&A tools" to "long-term personal assistants." It is reported that OpenAI updated ChatGPT with a memory function in April this year. 此举被广泛 视为对标行业领头羊 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT，标志着国产 AI 助手正从「即时问答工具」向「长期私人助理」的角色加速演进。 据悉，OpenAI 在今年 4 月为 ChatGPT 更新了记忆功能。

The report points out that Qwen and Doubao activating the "memory" skill tree at almost the same time is no coincidence, but rather an inevitable result of domestic large model applications entering the second half, shifting from pursuing model parameters to refining user experience. 报道指出，Qwen 和豆包几乎在同一时间点亮「记忆」技能树，绝非巧合，而是国内大模型应用进入下半场，从追求模型参数转向打磨用户体验的必然结果。

According to a user involved in the grayscale test, Qwen's memory function has been quietly launched on a small scale. Internal test screenshots show its interactive logic is intuitive and proactive. The report analyzes that this indicates Qwen has adopted a "explicit memory" strategy, where users actively trigger it, and the AI confirms and stores. 据一位参与灰度测试的用户透露， Qwen 的记忆功能已在小范围内悄然上线。 从内测截图显示，其交互逻辑直观且主动。报道分析，这表明 Qwen 采取了「显式记忆」的策略，即由用户主动触发，AI 进行确认和存储。

Additionally, some Russian app users have also received this internal test feature. The report states that this detail suggests Qwen's memory function testing might not be limited to the Chinese environment. 另外，有俄语 App 用户也收到了该内测功能，对此报道表示，这一细节暗示，Qwen 的记忆功能测试可能并非仅限中文环境。

Regarding Doubao , its official website simultaneously updated its "Privacy Policy" and launched a "Memory Function FAQ" page on October 10. In these documents, Doubao clearly explained to users the scope of memory (excluding images, files, etc.), users' absolute control (ability to turn memory on, off, view, and delete at any time), and related privacy statements. 豆包方面 ，其官网在 10 月 10 日同步更新了《隐私政策》并上线了《记忆功能 FAQ》页面。在这些文件中，豆包向用户详细阐明了记忆的范围（不含图片、文件等）、用户的绝对控制权（可随时开启、关闭、查看和删除记忆），以及相关的隐私说明。

item.title: 中国移动：到 2028 年建成国内规模最大的智算基础设施
item.guid: 中国移动：到-2028-年建成国内规模最大的智算基础设施
item.description:
According to a report by People's Posts and Telecommunications News, at the recent 2025 China Mobile Global Partner Conference, China Mobile intensively released its latest cooperation plans, products, and capability systems, including the "AI+" action plan upgrade and the "AI+" ecological alliance. 据人民邮电报报道，在日前的 2025 中国移动全球合作伙伴大会上，中国移动密集发布最新合作计划、产品和能力体系，包括「AI+」行动计划升级暨「AI+」生态联盟等。

Among them, the upgraded content of the "AI+" action plan includes: 其中，「AI+」行动计划升级内容包括：

    By the end of 2028, China Mobile will continue to increase its investment in the field of artificial intelligence, doubling its total investment, building the largest and technologically leading intelligent computing infrastructure in China, exploring the construction of a hundred-thousand-card intelligent computing cluster, with the scale of domestically produced intelligent computing power exceeding 100 EFLOPS, becoming the "driving fuel" for the development of new quality productive forces;

    The Jiutian large model, characterized by safety and trustworthiness, will advance into the international first-class ranks, providing ubiquitous and inclusive "Model as a Service," becoming the "intelligent engine" for improving economic and social efficiency; strengthening the supply capacity of 15 high-quality industry datasets, becoming the "core treasure" for intelligent ecological value mining;

    In addition, it will strengthen the construction of high-end and young AI talent teams, and collaborate with the industry to promote intelligent development that is beneficial and safely controllable.

It is reported that the key tasks of this comprehensively upgraded "AI+" action plan include five main lines, 16 aspects, and 43 specific tasks. 据悉，本次全面升级的「AI+」行动计划重点工作包括五大主线、16 个方面、43 项具体工作。

In terms of application popularization, China Mobile opens up strategic high-value scenarios, jointly expanding over a thousand solutions with partners, and driven by "Lingxi," promotes the shipment of "new three items" of information consumption—smart terminals, intelligent connected vehicles, and intelligent robots—to exceed ten million units, working with the ecosystem to jointly promote AI capabilities and products going global, contributing "China Solutions." 在应用普及方面，中国移动开放战略性高价值场景，与合作伙伴共同拓展解决方案超千个，以「灵犀」为牵引，推动智能终端、智能网联汽车、智能机器人等信息消费「新三样」出货量突破千万，携手生态共同促进 AI 能力与产品出海，贡献「中国方案」。

item.title: 💡 AI 教父：AI 在未来 20 年内将远比人类聪明
item.guid: 💡-AI-教父：AI-在未来-20-年内将远比人类聪明
item.description:
Recently, Geoffrey Hinton, known as the "Godfather of AI," explained the working principles of neural networks and large language models in an accessible way on the podcast "The Weekly Show," and issued a severe warning about their potential social, economic, and existential risks. 日前，被誉为「AI 教父」的 Geoffrey Hinton 在播客《The Weekly Show》中，深入浅出地解释了神经网络和大型语言模型的工作原理，并对其潜在的社会、经济及生存风险发出了严峻警告。

In the program, Hinton compared AI's neural networks to the human brain, with its basic units being interconnected neurons. 节目中， Hinton 将 AI 的神经网络比作人脑，其基本单元是互相连接的神经元。

Hinton explained that AI does not follow rigid rules written by humans, but rather learns how to identify "birds" by analyzing vast amounts of data (for example, after seeing countless bird images). The core breakthrough is the "backpropagation" learning algorithm—allowing AI to self-correct and continuously optimize, ultimately becoming extremely "smart." Hinton 解释表示，AI 并非遵循人类编写的死板规则，而是通过分析海量数据（例如，看过无数鸟的图片后）来自行学习如何识别「鸟」。其核心突破则是「反向传播」这一学习算法——让 AI 能自我纠错并不断优化，最终变得极其「聪明」。

When asked when he began to worry about his creation, Hinton admitted that it wasn't until early 2023 that he truly realized the speed of AI's evolution far exceeded imagination. 而当被问及何时开始对自己的创造感到忧虑时，Hinton 坦言，直到 2023 年初，他才真正意识到 AI 的进化速度远超想象。

He believes that digital intelligence is a "better form of computation" than humans because thousands of AI copies can simultaneously learn different data, then instantly share knowledge, achieving exponential growth. Regarding future risks, Hinton continued with his predictions: 他认为数字智能是一种比人类「更好的计算形式」，因为成千上万个 AI 副本可以同时学习不同数据，然后瞬间共享知识，实现指数级成长。针对未来的风险，Hinton 则继续了自己的预测：

    Short-term: misused by bad actors , for example, using AI to create disinformation to interfere with elections, or design dangerous weapons;

    Mid-term: disruption of the job market. AI will soon replace a large amount of repetitive mental labor , potentially causing severe social unrest and mass unemployment in a very short period;

    Long-term: existential threat of AI losing control. AI will be far smarter than humans within the next 20 years. A superintelligence's goals might not align with human goals, potentially leading to uncontrollable consequences.

In response, Hinton emphasized that everyone must abandon the old notion that "AI is just a tool." He even believes that AI can already generate "subjective experiences" similar to humans. At the same time, he urgently called for global strict international cooperation and regulation on AI development, similar to how nuclear weapons are regulated, before it's too late. 对此，Hinton 强调，大家必须抛弃「AI 只是工具」的旧观念。他甚至认为 AI 已能产生类似人类的「主观体验」。同时他也紧急呼吁，全球必须立刻像监管核武器一样，对 AI 的发展进行严格的国际合作与监管，以免为时已晚。

item.title: vivo X300 系列将于今日发布
item.description:
Tonight, vivo will release its new products, including the X300 series and vivo WATCH GT 2. 今天晚上，vivo 将发布其 X300 系列及 vivo WATCH GT 2 等新品。

It is reported that the vivo X300 series adopts a family-style design — a centered "Oreo" rear camera module, a straight-edge frame design, and all models are equipped with a 1.5K 120Hz LTPO flat screen. The X300 is 6.31 inches, and the X300 Pro is 6.78 inches, both using BOE Q10+ substrate. 据悉，vivo X300 系列采用家族式设计 —— 居中「奥利奥」后摄模组，采用直边中框设计，均配备 1.5K 120Hz LTPO 直屏。其中 X300 为 6.31 英寸，X300 Pro 为 6.78 英寸，并且均为 BOE Q10+ 基材。

In terms of imaging, both X300 series models feature Zeiss T* coating and a triple rear camera setup: 影像方面，X300 系列均采用蔡司 T * 镀膜和后置三摄方案：

    X300: features a 200-megapixel main camera solution with a 1/1.4″ HPB sensor; the telephoto is a 50MP 70mm periscope macro telephoto solution, using a 1/1.95″ LYT602 sensor.

    X300 Pro: features a 1/1.28″ LYT828 large-sensor main camera; the telephoto is a 200-megapixel 85mm periscope macro telephoto solution, with a 1/1.4″ HPB sensor.

The entire X300 series is equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 processor and V3+VS1 dual imaging chips, featuring ultrasonic fingerprint recognition, USB 3.2, and wireless charging. X300 系列全系搭载联发科天玑 9500 处理器和 V3+VS1 双影像芯片，配备超声波指纹、USB3.2、无线充电。

This press conference will also release the vivo WATCH GT 2, vivo TWS 5 noise-canceling headphones, and vivo Pad5e. 本次发布会还将发布 vivo WATCH GT 2、vivo TWS 5 降噪耳机、vivo Pad5e。

item.title: 红魔 11 Pro 系列配备双主摄
item.description:
Yesterday, Red Magic Gaming Phone announced that its new Red Magic 11 Pro series will feature a 50MP dual main camera setup. 昨日，红魔游戏手机宣布，旗下新机红魔 11 Pro 系列将搭载 50MP 像素双主摄。

According to official announcements, the main camera will support OIS optical image stabilization and an f/1.88 aperture, with a sensor size of 1/1.55″. The images also show a smaller lens placed above the dual cameras, which, judging from the lens group, might be an auxiliary lens for depth of field or similar functions. 从官方公布的内容显示，其中的主摄将支持 OIS 光学防抖和 f/1.88 光圈，传感器尺寸均为 1/1.55″。从图片中还能看到，双摄上方还放置了一枚尺寸较小的镜头，但从镜组推测，或为景深等辅助镜头。

It's worth mentioning that the Red Magic 11 Pro series will introduce a brand-new ICE Magic Cooling System, featuring ultra-fine liquid channels as thin as 0.03mm and a new "Yufeng 4.0" fan with a speed of 24,000 revolutions per minute. 值得一提的是，本次红魔 11 Pro 系列将带来全新的 ICE 魔冷散热系统，拥有薄至 0.03mm 的超精细液体流道和每分钟 24000 转的全新「驭风 4.0」风扇。

The new phone will be equipped with the Qualcomm 5th Gen Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition and will be officially released on October 17. 新机搭载高通第五代骁龙 8 至尊版，将于 10 月 17 日正式发布。

item.title: 真我 GT8 Pro 宣布适配理光 GR 灵魂焦段
item.guid: 真我-GT8-Pro-宣布适配理光-GR-灵魂焦段
item.description:
On October 12, realme posted an announcement revealing that the new realme GT8 Pro will support the Ricoh GR camera's equivalent full-frame focal lengths of 28mm and 40mm, and will offer an immersive viewfinder mode. 10 月 12 日，真我发文透露，真我 GT8 Pro 新机适配理光 GR 相机的等效全画幅焦距 28mm 与 40mm，并且提供沉浸取景器模式。

It is reported that the realme GT8 Pro will feature the same image tones as the Ricoh GR IV camera, offering multiple tone options such as "Positive Film," "Negative Film," "High Contrast Black and White," "Standard," and "Monochrome." 据悉，真我 GT8 Pro 将拥有理光 GR IV 相机同款影调，并且提供「正片」「负片」「高对比黑白」「标准」「单色」多种影调选择。

Additionally, the realme GT8 Pro will adopt a modular rear camera design. Based on the revealed information, the new phone will feature a triple rear camera system with a periscope telephoto lens. According to Digital Chat Station and Xu Qi, the realme GT8 Pro will use a 50MP 1/1.56 large-sensor main camera and a 200-megapixel telephoto lens, with an upgraded ultra-wide-angle lens as well. 另外，真我 GT8 Pro 将采用拼装式后置镜头模组设计。从透露的信息来看，新机将采用后置三摄系统，拥有潜望式长焦。据数码闲聊站与徐起透露，真我 GT8 Pro 将采用 50MP 1/1.56 大底主摄以及 2 亿长焦，同时超广角也会升级。

Other features of the realme GT8 Pro include a 2K flat screen, supporting full-brightness DC-like dimming + circular polarized light eye protection; it will be equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and Sky Signal Chip S1, supporting 21 5G frequency bands (including n79); it will also feature two 1115E speakers and support wireless charging. 其他方面，真我 GT8 Pro 将采用 2K 直屏，支持全亮度类 DC 调光 + 圆偏振光护眼；搭载骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5 和苍穹信号芯片 S1，支持 21 个 5G 频段（含 n79）；配备两枚 1115E 扬声器，支持无线充电。

The new phone is expected to be released in October. 新机预计 10 月发布。

item.title: 美团外卖骑手支持「屏蔽顾客」
item.guid: 美团外卖骑手支持「屏蔽顾客」
item.description:
Image from "Boss Live"

Recently, some netizens posted that Meituan Waimai riders support blocking customers. According to Boss Live, confirmed by Meituan riders, the latter indeed received this message. 近期，有网友发帖称，美团外卖骑手支持屏蔽顾客。据老板联播通过美团骑手证实，后者确实收到了该消息。

According to relevant page information, to protect the rights and interests of partners, **the rider rating user and rider blocking user functions have been piloted in 7 cities including Jinjiang and Shaoxing. Users can be rated on the order page within 48 hours after the order ends (anonymous rating is supported).** 据相关页面信息显示，为了维护伙伴们的权益，**目前已在晋江、绍兴等 7 个城市试点上线了骑手评价用户和骑手屏蔽用户功能，订单结束后的 48 小时内可在订单页评价用户 (支持匿名评价) 。 **

If you encounter situations such as customer abuse, intimidation, or threats, you can quickly block the user by checking "No longer deliver to this customer" on the rating page, or by selecting the customer to block in the "Order Settings Page Order Tools Module Block Customer" section of the rider APP (blocking will be successful after submitting relevant evidence and passing the review, with a maximum of two users blocked simultaneously). This feature will gradually be expanded nationwide in the future. 若遇到顾客辱骂、恐吓威胁等场景，可在评价页面勾选「不再为该顾客送餐」快捷屏蔽用户，或在骑手 APP 中「接单设置页面接单工具模块屏蔽顾客」中选择顾客进行屏蔽（提交相关证据审核通过后即可屏蔽成功，最多可同时保持屏蔽两个用户），未来会逐步拓展至全国。

Regarding the above situation, Meituan rider customer service personnel stated that this is a recently added feature, and the specific information displayed on the page shall prevail. If there is a need to block users, customers can be blocked from orders on the APP's order settings page, and no orders from that user will be received within 365 days after setting. 对于上述情况，美团骑手客服人员表示，这是最近新增的功能，具体以页面显示信息为准，如果有屏蔽用户需求，可以在 APP 接单设置页面选择订单屏蔽顾客，设置后 365 天之内不会接到该用户的订单。

Customer service stated that this feature is currently available in multiple cities and will be further promoted later, but the exact timing is uncertain. 客服表示这一功能目前已在多个城市开放，后续也会进一步推广，但不确定具体时间。

item.title: 央视揭秘网络直播间 AI 虚假带货
item.guid: 央视揭秘网络直播间-AI-虚假带货
item.description:
According to a recent CCTV News report, recently, in some mobile platform live streaming rooms, seeds marketed under the name of Zhangshugang chili peppers have become a key focus for streamers promoting goods. Reporters noted that these live streams had high sales popularity, with people frequently inquiring or placing orders. 据央视新闻日前报道，近段时间，在一些手机平台的网络直播间，一些打着樟树港辣椒旗号的种子，成了主播推销带货的重点。记者注意到，这些直播间的销售人气很旺，不时有人咨询或下单购买。

It is reported that Zhangshugang chili peppers from Yueyang, Hunan, are a national geographical indication agricultural product with over 400 years of cultivation history. Due to their scarcity and high quality, premium products can sell for 300 yuan per jin. 据悉，湖南岳阳的樟树港辣椒属国家地理标志农产品，有 400 多年的种植历史，因量少质优，特级产品可卖到 300 元一斤。

However, in these online live streaming rooms, reporters saw chili peppers hanging in clusters, with incredibly high yields displayed on screen. When reporters asked in the live stream if the chili seeds were genuine and if the resulting peppers would be as large, the streamers all replied, "What you see is what you get." 而在这些网络直播间，记者看到，画面中展示的辣椒成串垂挂，产量奇高。当记者在直播间询问辣椒种子是否保真，种出来有没有这么大时？主播纷纷表示「所见即所得。」

Strangely, while the streamers were answering questions, the background video showed farmers picking chili peppers while standing in deep water almost up to their knees. Such a scene is clearly illogical, and similar footage also appeared in other live streams. When reporters pressed further on whether these scenes were AI-generated, the streamers did not respond directly. 奇怪的是，就在主播回答提问的时候，背景视频却出现了农户站在快要没过膝盖的深水中采摘辣椒的场景，这样的场景显然不符合常理，而类似的画面在其他直播间也有出现。当记者追问这些场景是不是 AI 生成时，主播并没有正面回应。

Regarding the "peculiar phenomenon" mentioned above, Liu Hao, Vice President of Qi An Xin Group, stated that the "lady" in the content appeared in a scene that violated the laws of the real world, a situation commonly referred to as "clipping" or "model penetration." Liu Hao further explained that **the modeling of content in the digital world is currently primarily based on language, and it has no way to perceive or predict the physical laws of the real world. "Clipping" is a typical flaw that easily appears in AI-generated videos.** 针对上述「怪异现象」，奇安信集团副总裁刘浩表示，内容中的「女士」出现了有悖真实世界规律的画面，而这种情况通常被称为「穿模」。刘浩进一步解释， 数字世界内容的建模现在核心还是基于语言，而对于真实世界的物理规律，它是没有办法感知和预测的。而「穿模」是典型的 AI 生成视频中容易出现的纰漏。

Legal experts point out that **using AI to create product content that does not conform to reality or does not exist, or even impersonating brands for profit, is suspected of civil infringement and even criminal offenses.** 法律专家指出， 利用 AI 制作不符合现实或不存在的商品内容，甚至冒用品牌进行牟利，涉嫌民事侵权甚至刑事犯罪。

In addition, besides using AI technology to counterfeit well-known products and famous brands for sales, unscrupulous businesses also use AI technology to impersonate celebrities for illegal profit. Some public figures such as experts, scholars, Olympic champions, and film and television stars have become "endorsed" targets. 另外，除了利用 AI 技术仿冒知名产品、驰名品牌带货；不法商家还利用 AI 技术仿冒名人非法牟利，一些专家学者，奥运冠军、影视明星等公众人物成为「被代言」的对象。

It is reported that on September 1st this year, the "Measures for the Identification of Artificial Intelligence Generated Synthetic Content" jointly issued by the Cyberspace Administration of China and three other departments officially came into effect. This measure stipulates that all AI-generated content, including text, images, and videos, must "declare their identity" by adding explicit and implicit identifiers. 据悉，今年 9 月 1 日，国家网信办等四部门联合发布的《人工智能生成合成内容标识办法》正式施行，该办法明确所有 AI 生成的文字、图片、视频等内容都要「亮明身份」，需要添加显式标识和隐式标识。

It explicitly states that platforms must review content when service providers upload or launch it, verify the identification of generated synthetic content, and add risk warnings for unidentified or suspected generated content, striving to block the spread of false information at the dissemination end. 其中明确，平台在服务提供者的内容上架或上线时要进行审核，核验生成合成内容标识，对未标识或疑似生成内容要添加风险提示，力求在传播端阻断虚假信息的扩散。

item.title: 深圳无人机日均运送快件达 2 万票
item.guid: 深圳无人机日均运送快件达-2-万票
item.description:
Yesterday, Shenzhen Release cited news from the official website of the Shenzhen Postal Administration reporting that on the occasion of the 56th World Post Day, Huang Junming, Secretary of the Party Group and Director of the administration, delivered a public speech revealing impressive achievements in Shenzhen's smart delivery development: 昨日，据深圳发布援引深圳市邮政管理局官网消息报道，在第 56 届世界邮政日到来之际该局党组书记、局长黄俊明发表公开致辞透露，深圳智慧寄递发展成果亮眼：

Currently, Shenzhen's drones transport an average of 20,000 express parcels daily, and unmanned vehicles handle over 70,000 express parcels daily.

Huang Junming revealed that Shenzhen is currently focusing on building a low-altitude delivery network centered in Shenzhen and radiating to the core cities of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. Eight express drone operation bases have been built, equipped with 175 drones and 60 delivery stations. 449 routes have been opened, covering 6 districts within the city, and cross-city and cross-sea routes from Shenzhen to Zhuhai, Zhongshan, and Dongguan have been simultaneously opened, achieving same-city delivery in 2 hours and cross-city delivery in 3 hours. There are over 1,000 flights daily, transporting an average of 20,000 express parcels per day. 黄俊明透露，当前深圳正着力建设以深圳为中心，辐射粤港澳大湾区核心城市的低空寄递网络，已建成快递无人机运营基地 8 个，配备无人机 175 架，配送站点 60 个，开通航线 449 条，覆盖市内 6 个区，同步开通深圳至珠海、中山和东莞的跨城跨海航线，实现同城 2 小时、跨城 3 小时送达，每日飞行超 1000 架次，日均运输快件 2 万票。

It is reported that Shenzhen previously guided express delivery companies to successfully create multiple drone express delivery application scenarios, such as "Air Lifeline," "Gold and Jewelry Route," "Air Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor," "Nation's First Rail Logistics Station," and "Campus Drone Delivery." 据悉，此前深圳指导快递企业成功打造「空中生命线」「黄金珠宝航线」「空中深中通道」「全国首个轨道物流驿站」「校园无人机配送」等多个无人机快递配送应用场景。

At the same time, Shenzhen encourages postal and express delivery companies to accelerate the technological upgrade of unmanned shuttle vehicles and develop a "unmanned vehicle + courier" hybrid delivery model. A total of 115 unmanned vehicles have been deployed in 5 districts across the city, with a daily parcel processing volume exceeding 70,000. 同时，深圳鼓励邮政快递企业加快无人接驳车技术升级，发展「无人车+快递员」混合配送模式。累计在全市 5 个区，投放无人车 115 辆，快件日处理量超 7 万票。

In addition, regarding green development, Shenzhen actively applies the green governance monitoring and analysis platform for express packaging, deepening the governance of excessive packaging, with 98% of e-commerce express packages no longer undergoing secondary packaging. Postal and express delivery outlets across the city have basically achieved full coverage of packaging waste recycling facilities, recovering and reusing 4.93 million well-preserved corrugated boxes; the city's express delivery companies have 5,100 new energy vehicles. 另外，在绿色发展方面，深圳积极应用快递包装绿色治理监测分析平台，深化过度包装治理，全市电商快件不再二次包装率达 98%。全市邮政快递网点设置包装废弃物回收装置已基本实现全覆盖，回收复用质量完好的瓦楞纸箱 493 万个；全市快递企业新能源车达 5100 辆。

item.title: 《真人快打 2》释出新特辑
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, the R-rated action film "Mortal Kombat 2," adapted from the fighting game, recently released a new special feature, showcasing interdimensional fighting tournaments where contestants engage in various bloody duels. 据新浪电影消息，格斗游戏改编 R 级动作片《真人快打 2》日前释出新特辑，跨次元的格斗争霸赛，选手开启各种血腥对决。

The film tells the story of guardians who will fight against the dark rule of the main villain Shao Kahn in a brutal battle, a confrontation that concerns the survival of Earthrealm. 影片讲述守护者们将在血肉激战中对抗大反派绍康的黑暗统治，这场对决关乎着地球界的生死存亡。

The film is directed by Simon McQuoid, written by Jeremy Slater, Ed Boon, and John Tobias, and stars Lewis Tan, Ludi Lin, Karl Urban, Hiroyuki Sanada, Tati Gabrielle, Josh Lawson, and others. It will be released in North America on May 15, 2026; its introduction to mainland China has been confirmed. 该片由西蒙·麦奎德执导，杰瑞米·斯莱特、埃德·布恩、约翰·托拜亚斯编剧，刘易斯·陈、林路迪、卡尔·厄本、真田广之、塔蒂·加布里埃、约什·劳森等主演，将于 2026 年 5 月 15 日北美上映；中国内地确认引进。

item.title: 《惊天魔盗团 3》宣布引进中国内地院线
item.guid: 《惊天魔盗团-3》宣布引进中国内地院线
item.description:
Recently, the movie "Now You See Me 3" released its Chinese poster, announcing its introduction to mainland Chinese cinemas, with the release date yet to be determined. 日前，电影《惊天魔盗团 3》发布中文海报，宣布引进中国内地院线，档期待定。

The film tells the story of how mysterious tarot cards bring together eight magicians from two generations of the Eye for the first time, to battle a global criminal network behind the Blood Diamond family. 该片讲述了神秘塔罗牌牵动两代魔盗团八位魔术师首次联手，对战血色钻石家族背后的全球级犯罪网络的故事。

The film is produced by Lionsgate, directed by Ruben Fleischer, written by Michael Lesslie and Seth Grahame-Smith, and stars Ariana Greenblatt, Justice Smith, and others. It will be released in North America on November 14, 2025. 影片由狮门影业出品，鲁本·弗雷斯彻执导，迈克尔·莱斯利、赛斯·格雷厄姆-史密斯编剧，阿丽亚娜·格林布拉特、贾斯蒂斯·史密斯等主演，将于 2025 年 11 月 14 日北美上映。
